faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about VisuTry

q1.question: How does VisuTry's AI try-on work?
q1.answer: VisuTry uses Google Gemini 2.5 Flash AI to analyze your facial features and realistically overlay glasses onto your photo. The AI understands face shape, lighting, and perspective to create natural-looking results in seconds.

q2.question: Is my photo data safe and private?
q2.answer: Absolutely! Your photos are encrypted during upload and processing. We never share your images publicly or use them for AI training without explicit permission. Free users' data is stored for 7 days, Credits users for 90 days, and Premium members for 1 year.

q3.question: What's the difference between free and Premium quality?
q3.answer: Free users get standard quality images (800×800 pixels) with a small watermark. Premium users receive high-quality images (1200×1200 pixels) without watermarks, plus priority processing and longer data retention (1 year vs 7 days).

q4.question: Can I use the generated images commercially?
q4.answer: Yes! Premium and Credits Pack users can use their watermark-free images for any purpose, including commercial use. Free users receive images with a watermark for personal use only.

q5.question: How long does it take to generate a try-on?
q5.answer: Most try-ons complete in 10-30 seconds. Premium users enjoy priority processing, which means faster results even during peak times. The exact time depends on server load and image complexity.

q6.question: What happens to my try-on history?
q6.answer: Your try-on history is automatically saved based on your plan: Free users (7 days), Credits users (90 days), Premium users (1 year). You'll receive an email reminder 3 days before expiration, giving you time to download or upgrade.

pricing.title: Choose Your Plan
pricing.subtitle: Select the perfect plan for your needs

questions.question: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
questions.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. Your access will continue until the end of your billing period.

questions.question: What happens to unused try-ons?
questions.answer: For monthly subscriptions, unused try-ons do not roll over to the next month. For credits packs, credits never expire.

questions.question: Do you offer refunds?
questions.answer: We offer a 7-day money-back guarantee for all subscriptions. Credits packs are non-refundable once used.
